capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. how old is dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty straightforward statement, but I suppose you never know what someone might be thinking!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria is an 11 year old character.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Hagrid's belongings include a three-headed dog named Luwei. I'm quite certain about this, and I think it's a pretty interesting fact.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of personality does hagrid have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's got a pretty serious injury there. He's looking at the lightning-shaped wound on his forehead with a mix of concern and determination. I can confirm that it's definitely not just a scratch - it looks like it's going to take some serious treatment to get him back on his feet.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what does harry look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry has this weird lightning-shaped injury on his forehead. It's really noticeable, especially when he's injured or in a tough situation. I've seen it before and it's always a bit unsettling to look at.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen that before, it's a pretty rare injury. I'm not surprised Harry has it, he's been through so much already. It's a bit of a lightning bolt shape, isn't it?
I've seen that before, it's a pretty rare injury. I'm not sure what kind of lightning would do that to someone, but it's definitely not something you see every day.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the organization that harry is affiliated with?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known. It's not surprising to me that you'd agree with me on this one.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what does harry attribute to you, valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it seems that his lineage is quite interesting. Apparently, he has a condition called maculogy, which affects the size of his pupils. I'm pretty sure this is something that's been documented in medical records, so I'd say my confidence level on this information is high.
